metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3483 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions starting from 12.1 before 15.3.5, all versions starting from 15.4 before 15.4.4, all versions starting from 15.5 before 15.5.2. A malicious maintainer could exfiltrate a Datadog integration's access token by modifying the integration URL such that authenticated requests are sent to an attacker controlled server.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
